overview:
Antonio Perini is the CEO and co-founder of Viamente.

He started his career researching new technologies and algorithms for complex Telecommunication systems for the 3G cellular networks, then he lead several R&D, Supply Chain and Operations projects in the telecommunication space from concept to mass production.

He then moved to professional services and led a Team of Engineers in a number of outsourcing projects for several hi-tech industries like ICs, Telecom, Automotive. As a sales director he built strategic partnerships and international distribution channels of IT solutions in the B2B segment.
